_header: The son here lieth with also the father
Subjects: chronicles, verse in; epitaphs; kings of England
_description: Epitaph of the Emperor Henry, husband of Maude and son-in-law of Henry III of England, according to those who claim that he was buried with his father, translating Latin line which precedes it, in Part VII of Fabyan’s Chronicle, Part VII, cap. 227 — one couplet
